website_summaries.verdict: A multi-functional model at a value price.
pros: Versatile, user-friendly design that abides by all of the safety standards set by the CDC and USDA
cons: Caution is required when using the highest setting to prevent overheating

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a month.
customer_reviews.text: We had it for about a month, and during that time it works great. However, after about a month the heating element just stoped working. The timer goes, but the water no longer rises or heats. We used it once a day for the nighttime bottle. If you're going to make a product to help parents resolve a frustrating issue--try and make sure it lasts more than a month.
customer_reviews.author: KRS

customer_reviews.title: It is literally programmed to self destruct and break!
customer_reviews.text: Of all the useless things I bought or received after having a baby, this tops the list. First of all, if you run the warmer without water in it (by accident) it's programmed to self destruct and break. You can reset it but only 3 times then it's just permanently broken. Also if you're trying to warm the kiinde milk packets, they don't even fit right. The top of the milk packet stays frozen and you have to open the packet and push thr frozen chunk through with a knife. Honestly...save the money and just warm bottles under warm running water or by putting them in a pot with warm water. This product is a huge waste.
customer_reviews.author: Allison R

customer_reviews.title: WORTHLESS
customer_reviews.text: Loved this while it worked. We had this about 1 month before it stopped heating. It was great for breastmilk but I wouldn’t advise it for formula, it’s way too slow for that. *UPDATE* Two of these that have broken in only FOUR months. I’m amazed at how poorly this is constructed. We used this strictly for one breastmilk bottle per day, so it’s definitely barely used. We constantly watched the water level and cleaned it. DO NOT BUY THIS WARMER! It’s 2-3X the price of other warmers out there and it only works for about 1-2 months. It’s so frustrating buying something (when you already have to buy so much) and it’s not dependable. Save yourself the heartache.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Stopped heating after multiple uses
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased the tommee tippee bottle warmer because i thought being able to choose the temperature, amount and bottle type would make it easy and work better. Not only did it take forever, it was still frozen. Then i purchased this product because it defrosts first to protect the breastmilk. It is easy to use, heats fast and can actually heat up from frozen, unlike the Tommee tippee. UPDATE- we've used this about 20 times and it no longer heats up.
customer_reviews.author: Gillock

customer_reviews.title: I definitely do love this bottle warmer
customer_reviews.text: I definitely do love this bottle warmer. Fits any bottle brand and breastmilk bag. Warms amazing as well.The reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is the warmer had stopped circulating any water. I think for a warmer this price it should definitely not do that 4 days of using it. We did email their customer service and they responded within a couple of hours on calibration instruction. The machine started working again but it was a bit of an inconvenience for a day, especially as a new mom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works with ComoTomo bottles!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a warmer for my ComoTomo bottles and this fit the bill. Heats up my 3-4oz of breast milk in 6 minutes. Does require thorough cleaning to maintain the integrity of the unit. I imagine hard water would affect it over time if left sitting in the reservoir for long periods, but luckily we have a soft water filtration system in our home. Satisfied customer so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tesca24

customer_reviews.title: We bought this based on very good consumer reviews found here http
customer_reviews.text: This warmer works very well and gets the bottle warm while not leaving hot spots. The only issue we had is that one died and wouldnt heat. It was exchanged promptly and the new one lasted until we weaned our baby off a bottle. We bought this based on very good consumer reviews found here [...] and I think they were spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: We love the ease of use with this warmer and ultimately ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two since we have twins. We love the ease of use with this warmer and ultimately chose this one as it had good reviews with warming breast milk and I'm exclusively pumping and then bottle feeding. One warmer broke after about a month of use. Contacted Kiinde and there customer service was great! They quickly sent a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Janna Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Was great until it stopped working after 4 months of using about an average of twice a day. I’m trying to get a refund or replacement from the manufacturer but in the meantime I have to buy a new bottle warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Novonics

customer_reviews.title: I liked it because of the simple design but served the ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked it because of the simple design but served the purpose well and kept nutrition. I happily used it for around 1 month. But unluckily, something went wrong with the timer or machine. Tonight, I put the bottle inside and set the timer. After some time, when I came back, I found the machine did not stop as the timer was set up. The timer did not move at all. The machine almost boiled the milk. I had to throw the milk away because it was too hot. I wish they had a digital timer or have a better timer. But I am not very sure what caused it though.
customer_reviews.author: Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Can't survive without it.  Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how much I loved this warmer until it broke. It's been a lifesaver with my twins since they drink expressed breastmilk milk. It's easy to clean and warms to the bottles perfectly. When it stopped working after 8 months I emailed Kiinde and after I tried their fixes to no avail they sent me a replacement for free! Surviving without it while I waited for the new one was almost impossible. I love my Kozii.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Frank

customer_reviews.title: First one a lemon; second one works; could use a lid
customer_reviews.text: First one was a lemon and broke the first or second week, just stopped working. We contacted the manufacturer, and they sent a replacement product. The replacement has worked well, and we've had it for about three months. I do think it should come with a lid, which it does not. We were told the first one probably stopped working because it got dirt inside. Well, we followed the instructions for cleaning it, so wasn't our fault. With the new one, we cover it with some aluminum foil when it's not in use to keep dust out. That's an ugly solution though, so I really wish it came with a lid.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shopper

customer_reviews.title: There are better bottle warmers out there than this hunk o junk
customer_reviews.text: Junk. The first one I got stopped working in less than a month. The timer got stuck and just clicked but didn't move. The second one I got lasted a couple months, but then the water stopped bubbling up to fill the tank. We tried emptying the tank and resetting the switch on the bottom. Not to mention the fact that this takes WAY TOO LONG to heat a bottle when you have a crying infant who is hungry! Finally I got smart and ordered the Dr Browns warmer which not only warms the bottles SO much faster, it saves the preset time and holds water in the tank so you know when you need to fill it again!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Swymeler

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use warmer but may not last.
customer_reviews.text: Brought this kiinde for my newborn baby back in November, had no complaints under now. It’s very easy to use in that you just turn the dial and it starts heating. You can set the timer to various times and it stop automatically. However, the issue I am having now is that the timer does not work anymore. The warmer still works but the dial to set the timer does not. A little dissatisfied when I only used the warmer for 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L

customer_reviews.title: Solid warmer but expensive for what it does
customer_reviews.text: We got this after having been gifted a hand me down kozii warmer that wore out. It is simple to use and does a good job. But I’ve never owned another warmer, so I don’t know how much easier it is than any other one. It certainly seems expensive for a hot water heater, and the water chamber is enclosed, so I clean it according to the instructions but there’s no way to tell if you’re actually getting big clean or not. Next time I’d try a cheaper one first, then move to this one if that didn’t work well.
customer_reviews.author: yop

customer_reviews.title: Broke within first few months
customer_reviews.text: I had this for a couple months and it's already broken. The timer works but the water level does not rise. When it worked it was great, fits a variety of bottle sizes which was nice early on as we learned which bottle our baby preferred. We were diligent about keeping sufficient water in it, but still broke, even tried a hard reset. Will be looking for a different brand this time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Find another warmer, this one's life span is short!
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed. This is an amazing bottle warmer but its life span is very short. When went through two of these and our daughter isn't even 2 months old. The first one stopping rising water in one week and the second stopped rising water after 6 weeks, not even. This last one, I tried everything to get it to work. It would work two times and then wouldn't work again. As much as I love this product, do not buy it. Invest your money in another bottle warmer. You will be much happier not having to return the one you currently have or contacting the company.
customer_reviews.author: BoxxieTrolls

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good warmer, requires frequent cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Love this warmer. I do not love that when I got it, the instructions told me I was going to have to clean it every couple days and desalinate it every so often as well. Call me stupid, but I have not followed those instructions. So far it is still working well. If it breaks down because of my lack of following instructions, then I will blame myself and find a warmer that doesn’t require so much maintenance, I suppose. Who has time to clean more baby stuff? I already do laundry every other day and hand wash bottles and pump parts multiple times a day.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the best things I purchased for my baby! I am adding this portion over a year later: the pump broke on our warmer. We followed all the instructions and cleaned it properly, but it just konked out on us. I contacted Kiinde customer service via email and they gave me a few more suggestions for getting it to work. None of them got it working again and they agreed to send us a new one free of charge. I LOVE this product and the customer service couldn't be better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use, but partially broke after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: This bottle warmer is extremely easy to use, just as described in the product material, and by reputable online sources. However, after 4 months of use (used 3 - 4 times a day... or night), after setting the time on the clicky dial, it would tick down, but sometimes stop ticking, causing it to keep warming, but not tick down the time. As you can imagine, this is a very bad thing, because it can cause the milk to become too warm. The product does still sometimes work - about 50% of the time - but it fails often enough that you have to keep an eye on it and make sure the time is actually ticking down.
customer_reviews.author: The Edge

customer_reviews.title: Two units died after only short term use
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea of this warmer. Preservation of breast milk nutrients is something that’s important to me. Even though I followed all water recommendations and cleaning directions, my first warmer died after a couple months of use. I reached out to Kindii and they sent me a replacement that once again died - this time after a few weeks. As stated, I used distilled water, the unit never went dry, and I cleaned regularly using vinegar and bleach as discussed in the manual.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best out there - 5 years of using and counting
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt the best bottle warmer out there. We have used this for all 3 of our babies - we actually just bought a second because the first one stopped heating (it lasted 5 years though!). You don’t have to worry about it being scalding hot or hot spots in the milk as it slowly warms up and never gets too hot. The downside is that it takes longer to warm the bottle than others, but I’d rather wait a little longer than burn myself or the baby.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle warmer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. My wife and I have had great experience with this product. Although I previous process worked well (heating water in a mug using the microwave and then setting the bottle in the mug to warm), this devices is even nicer with the ability to turn the timer and walk away with minimal risk of overheating the food as long as you pay attention to the suggested times.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Quick and effective
customer_reviews.text: I live this bottlenwarner! If it stops working, email the company. They are very responsive and will help you fix it, if it’s fixable. I used mine for every bottle - sometimes 5-6 times a day! While traveling we forgot to add water and thought it was done for so I threw it out and bought a new one. Come to find out, there was a thermostat reset at the bottom! May be a little spendy, but it heated up the bottle thoroughly and evenly every time - and my baby likes her milk hot!
customer_reviews.author: vobermiller15

customer_reviews.title: Should last longer
customer_reviews.text: The air pump died after 5 months, even though the heaters still work. However, not something that can be used. Never run with low water, cleaned with vinegar, did the reset. We also had one to die two years ago. I will probably buy another, but the design is not very tough. The way it works is very good. Update: This third one That I purchased February 1, died this week, March 25. Same problem, the air pump quit working. This is less than two months use. Inexcusable. Sorry, but do not purchased this warmer.
customer_reviews.author: doug

customer_reviews.title: Works And Lasts
customer_reviews.text: Started using 01/2015. We used the same Kiinde Kozii With 2 kids. Used 1 year, packed away for 1 year then used for 1 year. After we used it, my cousin used it for a year, saved it for 2 years then gave it to my brother who used it this past year for his baby. So it’s lasted 4 years of uses. We were very meticulous with cleaning it properly with a vinegar mixture on schedule. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: RLeit

customer_reviews.title: Did not work out for us..
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money. This malfunctioned and stopped working one month after use. I followed the manual down to the science and it still broke. Returned to amazon for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Phe

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful until it stops pumping water
customer_reviews.text: I have used so many different bottle warmers since working in childcare for ten years. This is one of my FAVORITES! ... BUT, I have had to of them and they both stop working. The first one was about a year old and this had only been used about a month before it stopped working (even with regular descaling).
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hecker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect warmer my baby's breast milk
customer_reviews.text: Perfect warmer my baby's breast milk. It is easy to use. For me it works fast enough to thaw breast milk from my deep freeze.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, compact warmer
customer_reviews.text: We really like our warmer. It's very straightforward to use and clean: pour in some water to set it up; when you need a bottle just set the timer and the chamber will fill with warm water automatically; clean with dish soap and d'escale with vinegar once in a while. We've been using it for about 2 months with no issues so far. Because it uses a water bath, the milk never gets too hot. The only downside is that it is a bit slow to heat up - it takes a few minutes even for a small bottle.
customer_reviews.author: In LA

customer_reviews.title: Works good until it breaks
customer_reviews.text: We just had our first baby and bought one of these because it seemed really nice. It lasted about two weeks and then after using it for two weeks it quit working. I bought a second one, thinking maybe we did something wrong and caused the first one to burn up. The second one lasted two months and it stopped working. Both of the bottle warmers smell like something burned up inside of them. Needless to say we didn’t buy a third one, we switched to a different warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one month
customer_reviews.text: We loved this bottle warmer while it was working. Warmed correctly, moved warm fluid to a "reservoir" so our 3 year old cannot paw at it, and circulated the water so it increased heating times. An excellent little unit. Problem: the mechanism that raises the water stopped working after less than 3 weeks of use, and filled our house with an ozone smell. All this despite following the guide, and using reverse osmosis water in it. Kiinde was great to replace it (would give their customer service 5 stars), though, it seems based on all the reviews these frequently stop working. Hoping the replacement unit is more durable.
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable and not durable.
customer_reviews.text: I decided to write this review to let other potential buyers of my experience after my 3rd failed unit. Yes, we have had 3. We love it when it works. The pump stops working consistently after 3-6 months... then you start hoping you are lucky when you turn the dial to start the unit. At least it is consistent in that regard. I have purchased 3 over 3.5 years and the company has not fixed the issue. It is good for breast milk, but since doesn't last for even 1 year we will not buy a 4th. Would not recommend this model or brand to anyone due to lack continuous improvement and poor durability.
customer_reviews.author: HBMaGneT

customer_reviews.title: 2X: Great warmer, until it stops working
customer_reviews.text: I repurchased the Kiinde Baby Bottle Warmer after my first one clonked out. I figured it was an anomaly, and gave the item another shot. Well, I should not have been so gracious. My first one lasted a little over a year, the second one barely hit the five month mark and completely malfunctioned. The timer stopped working out of nowhere. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: kindler

customer_reviews.title: Two Months perfect use - then TRASH!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this bottle warmer when it worked. It was initially hard for me to learn how long to heat up the milk but once I did it was wonderful.....for 2 months! paying $40+ for 2 months of use is crazy. I cleaned it exactly like it was suggested. One morning I went to heat up breast milk to add to baby cereal & it never warmed up. The heating mechanism went out or something. Of course at that time I was out of town with my baby so I just threw it away. Now to look at my Amazon account & I could've return it - shame on me. I should've listened to the reviews!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Andersen

customer_reviews.title: WORTH THE MONEY! Best for breast milk.
customer_reviews.text: Love this company! So loyal to their customers. Love the warmer. Perfect for breastmilk. Doesnt harm your liquid gold like most warmers that use steam. Timer is wonderful. The lines to show full is very nice and the line that shows where to fill for smaller bottles. Warmer doesnt get to hot like steamers. Clearly. I will admit I had to get a new warmer because my first warmers timer was not working properly. But working with the company was fantastic. Quick response and so kind. I've bought alot of other kiinde products I love their warmer so much.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely exactly what I was looking for. It's easy to use and it works. Single step for a warmed bottle. You pour water in to the mark on the device (no cryptic vials) ahead of time. Then when you want a warm bottle you drop a bottle of any size in the chamber and turn the timer dial. It turns itself off. My 4 ounce bottles take 4 minutes to warm from refrigerator to room temperature. Longer time for warmer. They have a chart as a guide for other warming requirements. I am totally happy I spent the extra money on this warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Cristy

customer_reviews.title: Would Not Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy, but got the job done. Until it didn’t! I would not recommend this watmer because it stopped working within a month of use. We read that letting the water get too low would cause it to stop working, so we checked the water level religiously and replenished as needed. It stopped working anyway. Until it stopped working, it was easy to use, but now we’re back to heating Baby’s bottles under running water.
customer_reviews.author: MAES

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing! After a lot of research I decided this ...
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! After a lot of research I decided this was the way to go for warming breast milk. I exclusively pump so it gets quite a workout daily...6-10 times a day. It is so amazing I bought our daycare provider one too. No running warm water...no heating over the stove...just a turn or the dial and perfectly warmed bottles. The thin bottles and fat short ones fit no problem. I even use it to warm frozen homemade baby food. Would buy again and again. I have been using it for 5 months now with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Marci Robson

customer_reviews.title: THIS ONE!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a lifesaver! I love this bottle warmer. Been using for 4 months now every day, multiple times a day. No "hot spots", even heat, easy to clean and you don't have to fill it up constantly. I usually top it off ever other day when I see the water level gets low. Just drop the bottle in and turn the dial. Easy to use (and accurate) guide comes with it to tell you exactly what to set it to to get the perfect temp and it's been spot-on every time. Great for heating up baby food, too!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Good when it works, but two have broken on us in less than 3 months each.
customer_reviews.text: Good product, but unfortunately each one has only lasted us 3 months. The water never runs dry. It just stops rising and swirling. We use it 2 to 4 times per day depending on if we're out (where we just asked restaurants for a pitcher of really warm water) or I'm nursing him or we're at someone else's house, where again we just use a glass of warm water. Now, we're just going to keep using a glass of warm water. Thankfully, our 6 mo old doesn't mind cold breast milk.
customer_reviews.author: mva

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4 weeks
customer_reviews.text: After 4 weeks moderate use this broke, it would make the noise but the water would not rise. We tried using vinegar like the instructions suggest, but never had any luck. We even let the vinegar stay in there for days. Save your money and buy a different bottle warmer. This one is not worth it! They sent us a new one, which is still working! Well for the most part, the timer gets stuck and it will keep warming. We still use it, but set our own timers. Do yourself a favor and buy a different one.
customer_reviews.author: M. Parnell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works well but not very quick
customer_reviews.text: This warmer works great we use it for plastic bottles for breast milk. I have not tried with breast milk bags or jars of food yet. Very simple process to use and includes a very handy chart for how long to warm every type of container for each ounce. My only complaint is the amount of time it takes to warm up. The shortest time is 4 min and that’s only 2 oz from room temp. It’s hard to be patient when you have a very hungry child in the middle of the night. I would not recommend if you are looking for a quick warmer otherwise it’s great
customer_reviews.author: LKath

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Kozii and within a month the motor stopped working, so the water doesn't rise and warm the bottle any longer. I even followed the cleaning directions and made sure it always had water in it at the roght level. For $50, I thought it would at least last 6 months. I don't plan on buying this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsay Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great product...when it works
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Perfectly fits the Philips Avent Natural Glass Baby Bottles. Owned for approx 8 months worked well for the first 7. I would recommend only using distilled water. After 6 months of use, the Timmer would intermittently stop. Shortly after 7 the timmer now continuously stops and requires a nudge to keep ticking. Needless to say, I’m in the market for a new bottle warmer. Update May 14, 2018: I notified the company regarding the defective model. My email was answered within 48hrs. Two weeks later a brand new unit was mailed to me free of charge.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Broke - but then company helped!!
customer_reviews.text: Initially enjoyed this bottle warmer but after 7 months of use it just completely broke today. Super disappointed. We followed package instructions of descaling and always used the correct amount of water - not worth the price if it so poorly made. Back to warming bottles in running water.... ***UPDATE**** The company sent me a troubleshooting trick and it fixed my unit!! There is a reset button on the bottom that can accidentally get tripped, insert a paper clip to reset. Good as new!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mojica1038

customer_reviews.title: Slow But Effective
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this out of desperation to get bottles warmed up faster in the first couple of weeks. (We hadn’t planned to use bottles so early, but ended up supplementing with donor milk.) I definitely don’t think this warms up a bottle faster than running it under hot water, because essentially that’s what it does. However it is convenient to turn on the timer and set the bottle in, versus standing by the sink the whole time. It does work well with our Comotomo bottles! It didn’t solve the problem we had, but it works well!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny H.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for us!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous after seeing the mixed reviews but it wasn’t that expensive so I decided to go for it and I’m totally happy with it. The instructions say you have to turn it higher than 3 minutes, but you can turn it down once you get past the #3, so I haven’t had any issues with that. I pretty much only heat the Kiinde freezer bags so I can’t speak to food jars or regular bottles, but it does the job and I haven’t had any issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nanner12

customer_reviews.title: Great until it breaks
customer_reviews.text: This bottle warmer worked great. Heating up bottles with circulating water instead of steam. The problem is this warmer is GUARNATEED to BREAK at some point. The water will stop rising rendering the product useless. Within 2 1/2 months I have gone through 3 units and it just broke again. For being one of the most expensive bottle warmers out there, I cannot believe how this product cannot last. We used the warmer 6-8 times a day and followed all instructions, cleaning regularly. Read all the similar reviews, save your money, and stay away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Millelot

customer_reviews.title: ... hard to find one that worked and that we liked. After purchasing 4x different warmers on amazon that ...
customer_reviews.text: We've tried several bottle warmers and didn't think it would be that hard to find one that worked and that we liked. After purchasing 4x different warmers on amazon that were disappointing, we ultimately went with the Kiinde Kozii because that's what they were using at our daycare. It's pretty simple, there's just a timer setting and that's it. The warmer isn't "fast", but it doesn't flash steam the bottle, it's a gentle warming mode which is great for breast milk, but will also work for formula. From room temp water/formula give it about 10 mins for 7oz. If you need something faster, you may want to go with something different, but I highly recommend this warmer!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: The bottle warmer is perfect for breast milk bags, food jars, pouches, bottles, anything really. The only issue I had was that the timer stopped working one mine after 6 months. Literally would run for an hour if I forgot to shut it off. Tried to reach out to Kiinde but they never got back to me. Ended up buying another one because I liked it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolle Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Before it broke it was great
customer_reviews.text: We were careful to always check the water level before putting bottles in it. After 8 weeks of light use (and 6 days after my Amazon return period expired), the motor that circulates the water failed. I tried to pull out the motor, but it was wedged into the plastic shell so that I would have to cut the plastic to get it out, so it would not have worked right even if I did get a replacement part.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what happened but I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I used this once a day to heat my baby's night feeding and it broke after barely even 2 months of use. I made sure not to let the water level go down to empty too because I read that's a sure way to break it. Not sure what happened but I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mac User

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Slower than expected heating time. Then suddenly stopped working. really disappointed
customer_reviews.author: rick k

customer_reviews.title: Was great for about 3 months with medium use and proper care.
customer_reviews.text: Used for three months and died. Water levels were never under the threshold and it was only used it a few times per day and the water was changed once every two days. The device never needed to be reset, it just simply broke. Specifically the pump stopped working, the water still warms but it doesn't rise at all. Edit: Kiinde support was very responsive and quickly shipped out a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Needs improved.
customer_reviews.text: This product is nice but to short for big bottles. It's an egg timer on the front that times the bottle heating. I like how it slowly heats the bottle to preserve breast milk nutrients. I wish it had a cover to prevent the water from shooting out if the water is to low. I don't want to have to use more time and energy to clean up a mess when I'm taking care of my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed that I gave this to my daughter as a gift. Didn’t open and use until Friday. Opened the box, set it up, DIDN’T WORK! Never warmed. My daughter has used her old one at her house and wanted one at mine. The opportunity to return it on April 14th. I think Amazon should honor it. Says I needed to call the manufacturer. Not fair. I’ll definitely open every item and make sure it works next time. Still very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: It's a great product when it works
customer_reviews.text: It is the BEST bottle warmer I have ever used, but only when it works. Unfortunately, among the 5 units (same model) I purchased, NONE of them lasted more than a month. We had one out of five broken because of no heat, four out of five because of broken timer. The quality of this product is abysmal. It has two stars only because it is really the best bottle warmer when it works.
customer_reviews.author: Gee Lee

customer_reviews.title: Makes Nighttime Bottle-Feeding Quick and Easy!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bottle warmer! This is so much easier than running bottles under the faucet. We could never get the temperature right. With this, we set it and forget it and it comes out perfect every time. We give it 5 minutes for 3 ounces of milk from the freezer. Sometimes it needs longer but usually it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin C.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: At first we bought a very inexpensive warmer and it was awful! We had this model for our first daughter and didn't really want to spend this much second time around but found that you get what you pay for in the bottle warmer world.
customer_reviews.author: HouseManager

customer_reviews.title: It wears out every month.  Worst quality!
customer_reviews.text: This bottle warmer is fantastic... while it works. After a month it breaks every time. We are on our third in 3 months... and are now looking for other options. We will never buy one of these again, and will likely be returning it when we find a better system. DO NOT BUY THIS! It will let you down every time.
customer_reviews.author: J. Breitwieser

customer_reviews.title: Great warmer, awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bottle warmer that works like a charm. So easy, just need to descale and rinse out regularly. Unfortunately, the water pump on mine stopped working after about 4 months of heavy use. Kiinde's wonderful customer service helped me troubleshoot, and concluded some debris was caught in there. Since I wasn't able to fix, they are expediting me a brand new one free of charge.
customer_reviews.author: Je36

customer_reviews.title: Great Bottle Warmer
customer_reviews.text: I thought getting a bottle warmer was silly but my spouse was really panicking about how long it takes to warm up a bottle in a bowl of warm water. I bought him this warmer to help make things easier and I am so glad that I did. It is easy to use as long as you read the instructions carefully and it warms my breast milk in just a few minutes safely so that the important nutrients in the milk are unharmed! It has made bottle feeds so much easier for us. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J23

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: I love this! At first I didn't want it and thought that I'd just run the bottle under hot water. That for old quick and I also learned that improper/over-heading can reduce the nutritional value of the milk. Either way, twisting a knob and waiting a few minutes without having to think about the temperature is way easier and more safe than the other methods of heating. I'd have to replace this if it broke.
customer_reviews.author: MattSFT

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: After 8 months I would say I can give an accurate review of this product. I’ve gone through 4 of these and all but one have broken! The last one I have left is probably only still functional because I don’t use it that much. I give 5 stars to amazon for their generous replacement of each one that has broken but they did give me the impression the last replacement would be the last one. I stuck by this one because it was really easy to use with a timer, which after some time was incorrect. Like 7 minutes on there turned out to be 10 minutes in reality. Anyways this is an expensive piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Shrub

customer_reviews.title: When it works, it's good.
customer_reviews.text: we bought this and had the pump fail on the first one after less than 10 uses, the company replaced it under warranty, but the second one lasted less than 4 months before the pump failed again. We now have to go through trying to get it replaced again. I would recommend finding something more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warms anything!!
customer_reviews.text: We use the Kiinde pumping/feeding system but even if we didn’t, this warmer is life!! 8 months old and eating purees, I can warm the bottles of food in here without it over heating it. It’s so easy and not bulky on the counter. I just replaced my first one as it stopped working so this time I did 2 year warrantee in case that happens again. Wish I did that the first round but hey, first time mom, you don’t realize how much you will end up using it : )
customer_reviews.author: Teal

customer_reviews.title: Works great when it actually works
customer_reviews.text: I love this product when it actually works but in the 4 months or so that I’ve owned it I’ve had two break for absolutely no reason. I’m sure I could ask for another replacement but I’d rather it just work like it’s supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Buy the protection plan
customer_reviews.text: Mine broke after about 7 months. I bought the protection plan for 3$ since so many reviews said it breaks. They refunded me the full purchase via Amazon gift card.
customer_reviews.author: Vico and Steph

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We love this bottle warmer. It is easy to use and does a great job warming bottles and food jars of all kinds - our baby was very picky about bottles so we tried a lot of different brands. I had done a lot of research because I wanted a bottle warmer that did not warm bottles to too hot (didn't want burns and didn't want to destroy all the good stuff in breastmilk) or warm them inconsistently, and we also didn't know what bottles the baby would like, so we wanted a warmer that would fit all kinds of bottles. This one fit the bill and is easy to use and clean, perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jbird_o

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY UNRELIABLE - DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Both warmers have broken and no longer functioning after only 3 months use (once daily). The first time it was a fault with the heating filament. This second time the water no longer rises. Extremely disappointed in what otherwise could have been a very good product. There appears to be many complaints about the same issue - this is a very unreliable product despite following all the instructions with constant cleaning and descaling! They should no longer be allowed to sell this until they fix these issues!!! DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: VWM

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: I still gotta figure out how long is just enough to heat baby's milk but I love it so far. Just letting others know, if you have Medela storage packs then it will not fit in this Kiinde unless you thaw it yourself a little bit. Once you're able to fold the Medela bag a little bit then it'll fit into the Kiinde and then use it as normal.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Yang

customer_reviews.title: Has it’s faults but works well for what it is intended for
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little milk warmer. It warms a bit slow but you don’t want the breast milk to be over heated. Though the water reservoir can only be cleaned by sloshing soapy water and can’t be brushed and the crappy knob broke really early on and we had to use a soda bottle cap to replace the knob but the actual unit worked for 2 years warming up milk for 2 kids daily before it died. Update: Bought a second one for my new baby. Started using it on July 15 2019 now it’s Sept 10 2019 already broken. The pump that should be pumping the heated water to the milk bottle stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Al Reyan Ang

customer_reviews.title: I do love that it fits all types of bottles and bags ...
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers warned, ours stopped working after only two months of use. The water isn’t rising, despite us being very careful to follow the fill and minimum time requirements, which are way too inflexible for a baby care product in any event. I do love that it fits all types of bottles and bags since we are using a variety. But not worth the price if we need to replace regularly. Will be contacting Kiinde customer service today to see if they will replace and will write an updated review based on their service.
customer_reviews.author: MSD123

customer_reviews.title: This warmer works great! Auto shuts off after timer done which is ...
customer_reviews.text: This warmer works great! Auto shuts off after timer done which is so great so that milk doesn’t get overheated. And it can sit in their safely after if u get busy because the water only rises while it’s on. Goes back down after off. Great for heating milk from freezer in storage bag also!
customer_reviews.author: BlessedMama

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Loved this warmer for breast milk. Loved everything about it until it completely stopped working after 3 months. I always cleaned it and descaled on time because it was pricey and I wanted it to last. Will not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: No guessing!
customer_reviews.text: Takes the guess work out of heating my baby's breastmilk! I've been using a kettle since my first born. It's a pain when I get it too hot and have to let it cool when there's a screaming baby or toddler. I'd probably been cooking all the nutrients out anyway. This thing is a gem and works as described. The little chart for the timer is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: D. Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Great for breastmilk
customer_reviews.text: Love this for milk as well as heating up baby food. UPDATE: My warmer stopped heating after several months of use. I contacted customer service and after troubleshooting the problem it still didn't work. Within 2 days I received a new one in the mail. Customer service is top notch!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M

customer_reviews.title: Failed; Needy but good to the milk
customer_reviews.text: The Warner stopped working after 6 uses. It comes with a lot of maintenance instructions that need to be followed to the letter. Even though we followed them it stopped working. Could have been a fluke, but it doesn’t seem like it’d be the first time by the reviews I later watched. However, as a breastfeeding mama this does have an upside for its even and slow warning plus auto shut off. The liquid gold is treated very well. If you are ok with the high maintenance and some risk it will fail then go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Kasia

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This warmer is terrible and I'm so sad by it. I feel something has changed because I used one happily for two years no problems. But when I bought a replacement for our new baby it came and wouldn't work correctly. The water would not circulate regardless what we tried, even the manufacturers suggestion to hit it on the side (really now?). So we sent it back and Amazon was great and sent another. Well we've barely had this one and the timer isn't working at all. So in two months, two warmers that didn't work. Really disappointed as I loved the last one, but not worth the inconsistencies.
customer_reviews.author: Some See

customer_reviews.title: Love the idea, but disappointed that unit stops working
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of the kozii and the fact that this method of heating protects the nutrients in the milk. That doesn’t make up for the fact that after 3 months into using the warmer it stopped working. We followed the cleaning instructions exactly and always filled the Kozii over the fill line. Kiinde replaced the unit for free (thankfully), only to have the replacement unit stop working about 3 months later. The fact that this is one of the more expensive warmers we were looking at and that it stops working so easily is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: breaks constantly.
customer_reviews.text: the timer on this is so convenient. It allows you to put a bottle in, walk away and come back to it. When your hands are full with a LO this is great. However, it is so unreliable. I went through 3 of these before giving up and switching brands. I ended up with the avent fast warmer which was half the price. It works great and haven't yet had to replace it! Does not have a timer but at least it works. **Please help and select if this review was helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany JohnsonTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: (1) it warms nicely but is slow and that's tough with a hungry/irate ...
customer_reviews.text: We went through two of these in one year. Both broke the same way: the motor that circulates the water stopped working. This was despite proper cleaning and fairly gentle use. Kiinde customer service wasn't particularly helpful. Two other points of warning: (1) it warms nicely but is slow and that's tough with a hungry/irate baby; (2) it will stop working by design if you accidentally run it without water ... do that twice and it stops permanently. This isn't how ours broke, but it's worth knowing before you buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had a usable life span
customer_reviews.text: When it was working, I really enjoyed this bottle warmer. However, into 4 months of light use (usually once a day, sometimes twice) the water will not rise and heat. I wish I had paid more attention to the negative reviews before I bought. I'm a big fan of the Kiinde bag/bottle system, but I wish this warmer had a worthwhile life span.
customer_reviews.author: SJL

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working After 3 Months
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this little warmer. It's simple with an analog heating dial and just makes a light "ticking" noise and a "click" when the bottle is ready. It's small, lightweight and actually really portable once you dump the water out. Also pretty straightforward to clean. I was very satisfied with it until today when after only 3 months, it stopped working. Review of the manual and troubleshooting did not restore the warmer to function. I will try and call the manufacturer next. So, it's a great little warmer as long as you get one that lasts longer than 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Limbersay

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it - pump keeps breaking
customer_reviews.text: So annoyed. I love this thing when it's actually working. Got it in March of 2018 and the pump stopped working in Sept. They sent us a new one. The second one just stopped working last night. I follow the instructions on cleaning it and caring for it but the pumping system has some manufacturing defect they clearly haven't worked out. Not worth the expense to deal with this. Would be an amazing product if they fixed this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Izabella

customer_reviews.title: 31⁄2 years of use through 2 kids. Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it says. Used it for the past 31⁄2 years, and with regular cleaning, it still seems to be functioning properly. We have had an issue with the timer "sticking" and overheating bottles, but once you know about this shortcoming, it's functionally a decent product.
customer_reviews.author: Just Matt

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 8 months
customer_reviews.text: We really like this heater because it heats evenly and predictably. My husband cleans it every 1-2 weeks with vinegar as instructed. It suddenly stopped working a month ago, which is disappointing, but we are still bottle feeding so we bought another one. For the price, I'd expected a longer life span
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Good warmer, short life
customer_reviews.text: Died after 5 months using it only 1x a day. Followed all of the instructions carefully since I did read other reviews that theirs stopped working too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing second try
customer_reviews.text: We had a Kiinde for my oldest two children and LOVED it. We ended up buying it as baby gifts for all of our friends because it was so essential to our lives with little ones. Fast forward to baby number three and we decided to buy a new one (why? who knows...we should have just kept the first). This one stopped working after about a month of consistent use. Super disappointed and won't be purchasing a Kiinde again :(
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M Long

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a week of using despite following instructions
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this august 28th 2020 ahead of my baby arriving and it broke less than a week after I started using it despite following all instructions including keeping the water to the line, not letting it run dry and descaling as recommended. I ended up purchasing an Avent bottle warmer instead as this product was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Loss of my money
customer_reviews.text: I received a damage product. If I could give zero stars I would, such a loss of my money. I bought this product back in December to have it ready for my newborn in January. Last night I opened this product and it’s defective when we pour the water in it all came out. Unfortunately I threw the box it came with away, before I learned that it was not working. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: yara garcia

customer_reviews.title: Guessing game with every bottle
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this 0 stars I probably would lol it's a guessing game on how long it will take to warm the same size bottle every time you warm one. Sometimes 8 minutes will get the perfect room temp from fridge, sometimes 10-12 minutes, then other times 7 minutes will make it steaming hot and you then have to wait even longer for it to cool down. When you have a newborn who is already angry and upset, you need something quicker and more predictable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes, you do need this
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these that I have used multiple times a day for more than 4 months. I've never had a single problem, I've also never ran it with no water in it. This works great and is incredibly convenient. If you bottle feed you definitely want one of these. Glad I ignored the internet registry lists that said you don't need one of these (because putting hot water in a bowl while holding a screaming baby is so easy LOL).
customer_reviews.author: Just a regular mom

customer_reviews.title: Takes about 8 minutes to heat a 4 oz bottle
customer_reviews.text: Takes about 8 minutes to heat a 4 oz bottle from the fridge . Takes way to long to heat a bottle especially with a crying baby at 2 am. I bought due to good reviews but being a grandmother not a new parent 8 minutes can be eternity. Best option is to heat a large glass measuring cup with water in the microwave for 3 minutes and then remove and heat the bottle in that water for a minute . Half the time . Product looks nice but takes too long !
customer_reviews.author: CBCB

customer_reviews.title: A+ Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually write reviews but this is a great bottle warmer. I love that it has a timer with an automatic shut off to prevent the milk from getting too hot. It only takes about 6 minutes to warm up my daughters bottle. But what makes this bottle warmer so much better than the others is the customer service. I am currently on my third warmer. The first two somehow clogged and stopped working after 4 and 5 months. I was so upset. I emailed the customer service and they immediately sent me replacements. I have never experienced such wonderful customer service from a company. I can not say enough good things about them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bliss

customer_reviews.title: I’d like to give it a 5 star review since we ...
customer_reviews.text: I’d like to give it a 5 star review since we really loved it! However it just broke less than a month from purchasing it- the water has stopped filling up even though we’ve always kept the reservoir full.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: low quality
customer_reviews.text: Works great while it lasted, which was about 2 months. Not eligible for a return. This was the second one I owned. The first one lasted for 9 months. Pump stopped working on both. I tore that one apart to see if the pump was serviceable but it is not removable without breaking the plastic case. Not worth the trouble so I just bought a new one instead, which lasted only 2 months this time. Not buying another one. What I liked about it is that there was no excessive features. Just turn knob for the timer and done. I hate excessive features.
customer_reviews.author: puffs

customer_reviews.title: Broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: We barely use this since I almost exclusively breastfeed, however it broke after maybe 3-4 months of VERY rare/occasional use, I'm talking like once a week on a busy week. It completely stopped warming the water. 2 stars since it was great when it did actually work.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: One of the best warmers! Easy to use and to clean
customer_reviews.text: One of the best warmers! Easy to use and to clean! You can use a bottle brush to rinse the reservoir weekly, otherwise there will be some build up. I used these with Philips Avent Natural Glass bottles and the 4 oz bottles fit perfectly. I also used the Life Factory glass bottles (slightly taller than Philips Avent Natural) and they stuck out of the reservoir a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Kiinde Kozii Baby Bottle Warmer and Breast Milk Warmer for Warming Breast Milk, Infant Formula and Baby Food
product_meta.description: The Kiinde (pronounced kind) kozii allows parents to safely and quickly warm breast milk, formula, and food in storage Bags, bottles, or jars of all shapes, sizes, and Materials. It is the first and only warmer designed specifically to follow all guidelines set forth by the CDC (centers for Disease Control) and the USDA (United States department of Agriculture) to safely thaw and warm breast milk using warm, flowing water. Patent pending safe heat technology allows high-speed warming using a low temperature, nutrient-safe water bath that is safe for breast milk. The built-in timer eliminates the risk of overheating. The result is an infant bottle warmer that is safer, more precise, faster, and easier to use than conventional warmers that use high-temperature steam. The high temperature of these types of warmers can be damaging to the antibodies and nutrients contained in breast milk. Kozii's warming chamber is designed to accommodate a full 8-ounce bag of frozen breast milk and to quickly bring it to serving temperature. Safe heat ensures that the contents of the warmer are brought to the same temperature every time as easily as possible. A simple, easy-to-read timer allows parents to set the desired warming time by simply turning the knob. When the time is up, the warming stops completely, eliminating the risk of overheating, even if the bottle or bag is left in the warmer for longer than intended. Here at Kiinde, we take customer service seriously. If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to contact us (our support email address can be found on our website). feed your infant the quick and easy way. Try kozii today!
feature_bullets: SAFE & EASY WARMING: The Kozii baby bottle warmer creates a flowing warm water bath (NOT dangerous steam) to quickly and gently thaw and warm breast milk according to CDC and USDA guidelines. Unlike other warmers, Kozii does not require that you measure or add water with each use. It uses an auto-shutoff feature, so when the time is up, the warmer shuts off and completely removes the heat source from the bottle.

A GREAT BABY SHOWER GIFT: Every new mom knows convenience is key when it comes to feeding a baby. Kozii is a great way to heat up expressed breast milk, baby formula, or baby food as safely and quickly as possible. It’s an excellent product to use alongside other accessories, including a breast pump, bottle sterilizer, and bottle set. Put one of these baby registry best sellers on your registry today!

UNIVERSAL WARMING CHAMBER: Kozii’s warming chamber is designed for bags, pouches, bottles, and jars alike and it’s great for first-time moms. It’s gentle enough to thaw frozen breast milk and powerful enough to heat up pureed baby food. It heats foods to the perfect temperature for Baby so you don’t have to worry about overheating. You’ll be able to use Kozii from birth through the toddler years.

PRESERVES NUTRIENTS IN BREAST MILK: Breast milk is full of the great stuff! That’s why Kozii uses gentle heat to preserve the unique set of nutrients found in breast milk. You won’t have to worry about the integrity of vitamins, minerals, amino acids, enzymes, and white blood cells naturally occurring in a mother’s milk.

WARMS MANY CONTAINERS & MATERIALS: Kozii can heat up virtually any reusable or disposable container including milk storage bags, milk pouches, baby bottles, food jars, or liner bottles. It can handle both frozen and thawed breast milk and is great for heating up baby formula. Bottle steamers can overheat easily and aren’t effective for all materials. That’s why Kozii uses gently flowing, warm water.

specifications.Material Type: Phthalate free, Bpa free, Lead free, Latex free
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars2,487 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
